Aufait is an IT services company based in Bangalore, India. At Aufait we focus heavily on Digital Workplace Solutions to enhance Customer experience and Employee productivity. As a Microsoft Gold Certified Partner, we have proven case studies and success stories on Microsoft Office 365, SharePoint and Enterprise Mobiliy.
Our key offerings include Intranet, ECM and Mobility related solutions based on Office 365, SharePoint and DotNet.
Our customers include market leaders and reputed brands in Aviation, Oil & Gas, Government, Manufacturing, Real Estate & Education.
Our team across 4 locations comprising of developers, designers, UX engineers, quality assurance team, business analysts and project managers
